content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment for your living needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest rent possible. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 500 euros per month is far below my expectations. This is a prime location with all the amenities you could need. I'm looking for a more competitive offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. Given that it is an unfurnished apartment and located in the city center, I am willing to increase my offer to 600 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, while 600 euros is more in line with what I had in mind, I must remind you that this is a brand-new apartment with modern amenities. I believe it's worth more, especially given its central location. Are you willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your explanation, Mister Schmidt. Considering the condition and location of the apartment, I am willing to increase my offer to 700 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your persistence is commendable. 700 euros per month is more acceptable, but I must stress that this apartment is truly one of a kind. It would be a shame not to capitalize on its potential. Are you willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your point. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 750 euros per month for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your commitment to finding a suitable arrangement is impressive. 750 euros per month is a step in the right direction, but I still believe this apartment is worth more, especially considering the current real estate market in München. Are you open to considering a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Given the current market and the apartment's condition, I am willing to pay 800 euros per month for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your willingness to negotiate is appreciated. 800 euros per month is a more competitive offer, but I must emphasize that this apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and modern features. Are you willing to go higher to secure this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment's condition and location, I am willing to pay 850 euros per month for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your understanding of the value proposition is impressive. 850 euros per month is getting closer to my expectations. However, I'm still looking for an offer that reflects the true worth of this apartment. Are you willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. Considering all the factors, I am willing to pay 900 euros per month for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your dedication to finding an agreement is commendable. 900 euros per month is a strong offer, but I must stress that this apartment is a rare find in the München market. Are you willing to go higher to secure this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I've given my best offer. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, I understand.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your effort, Max. However, I'm not prepared to accept 900 euros per month for this apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe this apartment is worth more than your offer. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
